scripts.infrastructure:check: az deployment sub create -f infrastructure/azure/main.bicep -l westeurope -p environment=dev -c
scripts.infrastructure:deploy: az deployment sub create -f infrastructure/azure/main.bicep -l westeurope -p environment=dev
scripts.cert:setup: npm run cert:create && npm run cert:trust:mac
scripts.cert:create: cd ./infrastructure/local/certs && openssl req -x509 -nodes -days 730 -newkey rsa:2048 -keyout cert.key -out cert.pem -config cert.conf -sha256 && openssl x509 -outform der -in cert.pem -out cert.crt
